form.autoCoverImageText: The first image you upload in the next tab will automatically become the property's cover image.
form.businessLinksDescription: Add links to your business profiles (Instagram, Facebook, website, Google Business, etc.). Our AI Agent will share these links when guests have positive experiences to help boost your online presence.
form.businessLinksDescriptionPlaceholder: Describe your business links strategy or any specific instructions for your AI Agent...
form.shareableLinksNote: These links will be strategically shared by our AI Agent to help promote your business when guests have positive experiences.

additionalImages.title: Additional Images
additionalImages.description: Add images with descriptions to show tourists visual information about the property. Images should be accompanied by clear context so our AI agent knows when to show them to tourists (e.g., "View from the terrace" or "Oven instructions").

documents.title: Property Documents
documents.description: Add documents such as guides, instructions, house rules or FAQs to answer guests' frequently asked questions. These documents will be used by our AI Agent to provide accurate and personalized answers to tourists.

types.faqDescription: Answers to common questions about the property, area or services
types.guidesDescription: Instructions for using appliances, wifi, TV, etc.
types.houseRulesDescription: Specific rules that guests must follow
types.inventoryDescription: List of available objects and equipment

hints.googleBusiness: Our AI agents will automatically send this link to satisfied guests to get positive reviews

labels.name: Property name
labels.googleBusinessDescription: Connect your property with Google Business Profile to improve visibility
labels.googleBusinessHelper: Find your Google Business Profile URL in Google My Business

validation.imageFormat: File must be a valid image

modal.deleteConfirmMessage: Are you sure you want to delete the property "{{propertyName}}"? This action cannot be undone.

empty.title: No properties
empty.noResults: No properties found with the applied filters
empty.addFirst: Start by adding your first property

detail.addImagesWhileEditing: You can add images while editing the property
detail.addDocumentsWhileEditing: You can add documents while editing the property

propertyManagement.intelligentProcessingAIDescription: Automatically categorizes images and documents using n8n + AI for WhatsApp/Telegram agents

property.title: Subscription required to create properties
property.description: With a subscription plan you can create and manage multiple properties, add images, documents and access all advanced features.

reservation.title: Reservation limit reached
reservation.description: Upgrade your plan to manage more reservations and access advanced management features.

analytics.title: Analytics - Premium Feature
analytics.description: Get valuable insights about your properties and reservations performance with our subscription plans.

export.title: Data Export - Pro Feature
export.description: Export your data in multiple formats with our Pro and Enterprise plans.

custom.title: Premium Feature
custom.description: This functionality is available in our subscription plans.

upgrade.freeReminder: You can continue exploring the app with your free account
